Package hac.repo.board

Class Board

java.lang.Object
hac.repo.board.Board
@Entity public class Board extends Object
A Board entity. Saves a submarines' list and a tiles' list. Also saves a pointer to a player and some constants that are in use in the program. Relations: Board with Tile is OneToMany. Board with Submarine is OneToMany. Board with Player is OneToOne mapped by player's id.

    • getHitChanges

      public ArrayList<HashMap<String,String>> getHitChanges(int row, int col)
      Get the status changes in the board after a hit.
      Parameters:
      row - the row number of the hit location.
      col - the column number of the hit location.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of HashMaps, each containing row, column and status of hit tiles.

    • getListAfterHit

      private ArrayList<HashMap<String,String>> getListAfterHit(Tile tile, Submarine submarine, int hitRow, int hitCol)
      Generate a list of hit statuses after a tile has been hit.
      Parameters:
      tile - The tile that has been hit.
      submarine - The submarine located on the hit tile.
      hitRow - The row number of the hit location.
      hitCol - The column number of the hit location.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of HashMaps, each containing row, column and status of hit tiles.

    • makeHit

      private HashMap<String,String> makeHit(Tile tile, int row, int col)
      Create a map of hit information.
      Parameters:
      tile - The tile that has been hit.
      row - The row number of the hit location.
      col - The column number of the hit location.
      Returns:
      HashMap containing the row, column and status of a hit tile.
